name: terrarium
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a container, often with a glass front, in which small reptiles or other small creatures are kept: The terrarium is without doubt the most important aspect of successful reptile and amphibian keeping.
Dave King/Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
a glass container in which plants are grown: glass terrariums to create your own miniature green space indoors
ondacaracola photography/Moment/GettyImages
